11.eng-name: The Rites of Hajj (Kitab Al-Manasik Wa'l-Hajj)

hadiths.text: Hafsah, daughter of AbdurRahman ibn AbuBakr, reported on the authority of her father:The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said to AbdurRahman: AbdurRahman, put your sister Aisha on the back of the camel behind you and make her perform umrah from at-Tan'im. When you come down from the hillock (in at-Tan'im), she must wear (ihram for umrah), for this is an umrah accepted (by Allah)

chapter.ara-name: باب الْمُهِلَّةِ بِالْعُمْرَةِ تَحِيضُ فَيُدْرِكُهَا الْحَجُّ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding The Menstruating Women Who Entered Ihram For 'Umrah, But Then Caught The Time Of Hajj, So
